channel.title: Comments on: 4 ways to get 20 retweets or 4 ways to finish Gary’s 20 retweet/reblog assignment

item.title: By: "oppna ett binance-konto
item.dc:creator: "oppna ett binance-konto
item.description: Thank you for your sharing. I am worried that I lack creative ideas. It is your article that makes me full of hope. Thank you. But, I have a question, can you help me?
item.content:encoded: Thank you for your sharing. I am worried that I lack creative ideas. It is your article that makes me full of hope. Thank you. But, I have a question, can you help me?

item.title: By: Регистрация
item.dc:creator: Регистрация
item.description: Can you be more specific about the content of your article? After reading it, I still have some doubts. Hope you can help me. https://www.binance.com/bg/join?ref=S5H7X3LP
